name: Execution via CL_Invocation.ps1
description: Detects Execution via SyncInvoke in CL_Invocation.ps1 module
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*CL_Invocation.ps1* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*SyncInvoke*)`
